verses.name: Deuteronomy 6:13
verses.text: Thou shalt fear the Lord thy God, and serve him, and shalt swear by his name.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 6:14
verses.text: Ye shall not go after other gods, of the gods of the people which are round about you;

verses.name: Deuteronomy 6:15
verses.text: (For the Lord thy God is a jealous God among you) lest the anger of the Lord thy God be kindled against thee, and destroy thee from off the face of the earth.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 6:16
verses.text: Ye shall not tempt the Lord your God, as ye tempted him in Massah.
